scripts.start: npm run run-build && npm run serve
scripts.start-reloadsw: npm run run-build-reloadsw && npm run serve
scripts.start-claims: npm run run-build-claims && npm run serve
scripts.start-claims-reloadsw: npm run run-build-reloadsw-claims && npm run serve
scripts.build: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true vite build
scripts.run-build: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-claims: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-claims: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
